homepage.presentation: Sigma.2000 is a young multidisciplinary artist from Nantes, originating from graffiti and evolving into digital art.

about.pratices: Each of her practices influences and interacts with the others, forming a unique style characterized by a dancing and sharp line.
about.abstraction: Her work often distorts reality, driven by a genuine maelstrom that leads her creations toward pure abstraction.
about.conclusion: Fueled by a visceral desire to capture the moment, Sigma.2000 freezes fragments of a world in constant transformation.

exhibitions.group-vacarmes: {group} {vacarmes} at {rita} in Villeurbanne from November 13, 2023, to January 14, 2024.
exhibitions.group-7th-continent: {group} {continent} organized by {gallery} in Saint Ouen, from June 7 to September 21, 2021.
exhibitions.sale-bloc-13: {sale} of monotypes and photographs at the {market} in Nantes.
exhibitions.solo-green-tide: {solo} {tides} organized by {igem} (International Genetically Engineered Machine competition) at the {university} in Nantes, October 2021.
exhibitions.group-igem: {group} with {igem} at the {maison} in Nantes, September and October 2020.

career.intro: Holder of a degree in art history and passionate about self-learning, I have enriched my knowledge through various evening classes at fine arts schools, particularly in drawing and oil painting.
career.beginning: For three years, I attended a life drawing class with Emmanuel Billeaud, who taught me a great deal. I began creating by exploring various mediums at Centrale 7, guided in part by Christophe Forget.
career.digital-art: I discovered digital art through numerous workshops organized by Stereolux and AADN, which allowed me to broaden my creative horizons
career.conclusion: More recently, I have also become a web developer, enabling me to combine my artistic background with the digital world.
